description.raw:
This PR adds support for testing \(partially\) the[ instructions to install a local instance of subt infrastructure](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim) . There is an error of communications some instructions that I leave commented out in the code that will require further debugging.

There is still value in testing build and run of the main docker images.

Tested:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-install-cloudsim_mirror-bionic-amd64&build=25)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install-cloudsim\_mirror-bionic-amd64/25/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install-cloudsim_mirror-bionic-amd64/25/))
